select tcd.*,tpd.productVersion_name productVersionname,tpc.productCpu_name productCpuname, tpr.productOrigin_name productOriginname,tpb.productBrand_name productBrandname,tos.operatingSystem_name operatingSystemName
from t_commodity tcd
LEFT JOIN t_productversion tpd on tcd.productVersionid = tpd.productVersion_id
LEFT JOIN t_productcpu tpc on tcd.productCpuId = tpc.productCpu_id
LEFT JOIN t_productorigin tpr on tcd.productOriginId = tpr.productOrigin_id
LEFT JOIN t_productbrand tpb on tcd.productBrand = tpb.productBrand_id
LEFT JOIN t_operatingsystem tos on tcd.operatingSystem = tos.operatingSystem_id
where tcd.productState = 1
and productName like '%${productName}%'
and timeToMarket > #{startDate}
and timeToMarket < #{endDate}

LEFT JOIN t_productbrand tpb on tcd.productBrand = tpb.productBrand_id
LEFT JOIN t_operatingsystem tos on tcd.operatingSystem = tos.operatingSystem_id

mapper.select:
select tpc.*,GROUP_CONCAT(tpv.productVersion_name,'-') versionName from t_productcolor tpc
LEFT JOIN t_commodity_color tcc on tpc.productColor_id = tcc.productColorid
LEFT JOIN t_commodity tcd on tcd.productId = tcc.commodityid
LEFT JOIN t_version_color tvc on tpc.productColor_id = tvc.productColorid
LEFT JOIN t_productversion tpv on tpv.productVersion_id = tvc.productVersionid
where tcd.productId = #{id}
GROUP BY tpc.productColor_id

select tcd.*,tpd.productVersion_name productVersionname,tpc.productCpu_name productCpuname, tpr.productOrigin_name productOriginname,tpb.productBrand_name productBrandname,tos.operatingSystem_name operatingSystemName
from t_commodity tcd
LEFT JOIN t_productversion tpd on tcd.productVersionid = tpd.productVersion_id
LEFT JOIN t_productcpu tpc on tcd.productCpuId = tpc.productCpu_id
LEFT JOIN t_productorigin tpr on tcd.productOriginId = tpr.productOrigin_id
LEFT JOIN t_productbrand tpb on tcd.productBrand = tpb.productBrand_id
LEFT JOIN t_operatingsystem tos on tcd.operatingSystem = tos.operatingSystem_id
where tcd.productState = 1 and tcd.productId = #{id}

SELECT c.productId id, c.productName name, c.productIntroduction description, c.commodityPrice price, co.productColor_name color, co.productColor_img img, c.numberOfCameras camera, c.commoditySales sale, o.operatingSystem_id systemId, o.operatingSystem_name system, c.timeToMarket time, p.productBrand_id brandId, p.productBrand_name brand, ty.type_id typeId, ty.type_name typename FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_operatingsystem o ON c.operatingSystem = o.operatingSystem_id LEFT JOIN t_productbrand p ON c.productBrand = p.productBrand_id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_color cco ON c.productId = cco.commodityid LEFT JOIN t_productcolor co ON cco.productColorid = co.productColor_id LEFT JOIN t_type ty ON p.productBrand_typeId=ty.type_id WHERE c.productState = 1 and c.productId=#{productId} GROUP BY c.productId
